headline: Car Wheels on a Gravel Road Lead to Exhilarating Views
abstract: Near the country’s southern coast, where Montevideo and Punta del Este lure tourists, prices remain attractive despite steady increases.
lead_paragraph: This two bedroom, two-bathroom house sits on 12.4 acres outside the town of Pueblo Edén, Uruguay, about 25 miles north of the coastal resort of Punta del Este and 80 miles east of the nation’s capital, Montevideo.
